features: Magnetic Weatherproof Case - Provides FIRM Magnetic Mount which is the key to knowing the Spytec GPS M2 case will remain securely attached
The sturdy and weatherproof design is perfect for long term GPS tracking, suitable for use on cars, trucks, vehicles and assets outdoors - keeping the interior safe from moisture and corrosion

Includes 2 powerful magnets to attach to any asset's surface if you need a hidden GPS tracker for your stuff.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Snap the Cover Shut and Seal in Security The M2 Weatherproof Magnetic Case from Spytec GPS shelters the GL300 Real-Time GPS Tracker from damage caused by water, dust, dirt, or sand. With the tracker safely contained in the sealed case, its electronic components are protected. Within the case a GL300 tracker could be placed under a vehicle, and the tracker will continue to operate even if the vehicle becomes submerged during a flood or caught in a sandstorm. Because the case is made from an industrial-strength, high-grade plastic, incoming and outgoing signals are not blocked as they might be in a metallic case. Essential Insurance that Works for You The Weatherproof Magnetic Case may not seem necessary when conditions are normal, but weather is fickle. If the GL300 Mini Portable Real-Time GPS Tracker is riding shotgun on a vehicle, any number of conditions could be encountered during a trip. If you've invested in a GPS tracker, the one-time cost of a protective case like the M2 is trivial. Magnetic Attachment Thanks to a pair of powerful, built-in magnets, the entire case attaches securely to the flat, metallic surface of whatever you want to track. You could affix the case to the bottom of a safe or strongbox. It could be placed under the hood of a car, truck or bus. It could be fastened to the top of construction equipment or to the side of a mobile broadcast studio. When you're ready to transfer the tracker elsewhere, you'll be able to remove the case without damaging or altering the surface of the vehicle or asset where it was initially attached.

You need your GPS Tracker to do its job under any condition, and if you want to keep your GL300 tracker looking and functioning like new, a quality case is essential. Not only does the GL300 case protect your tracker with a durable outer layer of PC and ABS plastics, but it significantly enhances the function of the tracker. By applying the magnetic case to any flat, metal surface, you can effectively mount your tracker anywhere in, on, or underneath your vehicle. The case also has a fully waterproofed exterior, protecting the tracker from exposure to rain, snow, or dirt. With the GL300 case, you can be assured that your tracker stays functional no matter the circumstance, whether you run over a pothole, drive off-road, or expose your tracker to the harshest elements. Features: Constructed of PC and ABS for durabilityFirm magnetic mountCompact sizeSuitable for use with GL300

M2 Magnetic Weatherproof GPS Case M4 Pro Extended Battery Case for GL300 M6 Pro XL Extended Battery Case for GL300 3X normal battery life ✓ 12X normal battery life ✓ Easy installation ✓ ✓ ✓ Weatherproof ✓ ✓ ✓ Less than 7" long ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this product. I purchased is over two years ago and can endorse this product. The magnetics are very powerful and I use it to hide a key on my vehicle.The container is watertight and is big enough to contain your personal things. The magnetics hold the container so that your contents are secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than delivers on everything promised, weatherproof, stays put, doesn't effect signal quality at all.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is well worth every penny you pay for it, it works wonderfully and the magnets are VERY strong. I never once had an issue with this unit staying in place exactly where I left it, even after weeks of use, lots of highway miles, and in all kinds of weather. Construction is very sturdy and durable, magnets hold extremely well, it never let so much as a drop of water through and onto the unit inside it, still small enough to fit into pretty tight places so it does not stick out, never once had an issue with the case blocking the signal to or from the unit inside it and the magnets do not cause any kind of interference either. It does make a pretty loud and distinct noise when installing onto a vehicle since the magnets really are so strong. Makes installation and access a breeze and it can be done very quickly. I have no complaints and have been using it for almost 6 months now, it is well worth the price purely for convenience and piece of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Spare Keys!
reviews.reviewText: I know this is outside this products designed use but I purchased this specifically to be used for spare keys, and some backup cash. As this was designed to hold a gps tracking device the magnets are more than strong enough to hold a couple keys and a couple $20’s. The magnets are very strong and the box locks very tightly. Although it doesn’t really matter in my application it does appear to be weather tight. This is a fantastic value and perfect for gps trackers (which I actually do have experience with) or hidden keys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice waterproof and very sold case.
reviews.reviewText: The case works great but it doesn't work with the gps tracker that Amazon said it would when frequently bought together. No i'm sorry but i don't fit in this box but that's alright because I used the heavy duty powerful magnets and using a little epoxy i mounted those onto my GPS tracker. Just be careful because im sure this will void the warranty but I didn't have time to order a replacement so I made something work. put it this way. the car it was attached to got hit by a train track inspecting truck on the same side it was mounted on and it never came off . When i went to retrieve it at first i couldn't tell where it was supposed to be with all the metal twisted up. But right in front of my eyes is where I should have been looking because that's where the tracker with the powerful magnets attached to them ended up.Still a great box to store things in and it doesn't take up a lot of space. Thanks kenny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this box. The magnet is very strong. Excellent quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has a strong magnet for adhering. Water does not get in. Product says in place

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 years later 20k miles-still there
reviews.reviewText: I put this case with $460 cash under our car 4yrs ago, driven 20k miles and it’s till there are and sound.
Le queda perfecto a un GL300W de Queclink con batería de 2600mAh

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid and sturdy to protect the GPS Unit
reviews.reviewText: The magnet cases is solid like a rock, very well built and looks like it could take some abuse, The GPS unit sits in the case very firmly and the latches that hold the case close aren't anything where you will have to worry about it falling out because the latch came open. The case has a double latch and has two very very strong magnets on it, so if you placed this underneath or inside on a steel or metal surface it should hold in place very well. I turned the GPS unit on and put it in the magnetic case and I placed this unit inside the cab underneath the dash and stuck it to a spot where there was metal that would be up and under the passenger side foot well dash area and it stuck on their really well.
気密性、防水性がいい。マグネットも強力で安心感あり。
SUPER LIGERO, EL IMAN ES SUPER FUERTE Y ES PEQUEÑO

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy case holds up better than it looks like it would.
reviews.reviewText: The case works a heck of a lot better than the SpyTec Tracker 300 series in Canada. The circular magnetic mounts do not inspire confidence but the case actually does work very well as long as you can find enough actual bare metal for a proper flush mount. I would recommend the case 100% but if you are not in the USA I would avoid the tracker until they make the 30Ma functional north of the border and hopefully work out the ongoing issues. (My understanding is that in the USA the tracker works very well - but we have only used it north of the border).
